name: Full Name, incl prefix, mult. suffix
description: This statement will match names as simple as: John Doe, or as complex as Dr. John Lee O'Dough, Phd., dds.Up to 4 titles can be added with one salutation. Names can be two words or three words. The last word can have an apostrophe in it and the middle word can optionally have a period in it.
author: Jason Burnett
